name: Mencerdaskan Kehidupan Bangsa #4
description:
Sebuah karya redesign dari buku pelajaran yang menjadi memori kolektif di era Orde Baru yang dikontekstualkan dengan kondisi sistem pendidikan Indonesia saat itu (red: 2014)
A redesign works of textbooks that became a collective memory in the New Order era which was contextualized with the conditions of the Indonesian education system at that time (ed: 2014)

1000x1400 pixels
50 editions
2014
